Text: Return the first unit that arrives at this fortification to its recruitment rail; that unit cannot be redeployed this turn. If multiple units arrive at the same time, your opponent may choose which unit to return.

Name: Indestructible

The next time a card arrives at that fortification, the attached melee card becomes the target of that card's attack. If the attack does not destroy the attached melee card, return it to its original recruitment rail.
